channel.title: Compile can't find java
channel.description:
I can't compile the server it said
[code]Javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue...[/code]
[code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
path for jdk1.6.0_29 is [code]Computer ▷ Local Disk (C:) ▷ Program Files ▷ Java ▷ jdk1.6.0_29 ▷[/code]
Please tell me what I do now?

item.title: Compile can't find java
item.dc:creator: @lolboy396 lolboy396
item.description:
@lolboy396 wrote:

try this website i use a lot if i forget

http://javatester.org/version.html

Read full topic

item.title: Compile can't find java
item.dc:creator: @IloveNOAH IloveNOAH
item.description:
@IloveNOAH wrote:

Still same thing

Javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue...

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Compile can't find java
item.dc:creator: @lolboy396 lolboy396
item.description:
@lolboy396 wrote:

Right click on bat file then click edit and put this code in it

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

hope it Helps

Read full topic
